CardData.Name: Practical_Joke
CardData.Description: Inflict 25 damage. On their next attack, the targeted enemy has a 40% chance to damage themselves or an ally, instead of a member of your team.

CardData.Name: Trauma
CardData.Description: Attack all enemies 3 times for 5  damage each. 50% chance to Apply HP Block per hit.

CardData.Name: Serate
CardData.Description: Attack enemy for 25 damange and apply Bleed ( Deal 7 damage per turn for 3 turns.)

CardData.Name: Pandora's_Box
CardData.Description: Attack enemy for 10 damage. Increase attack power by 20% per debuff on targeted enemy.
